products.name: C-2300 Block Cutter
products.shortDescription: High-precision block cutting machine for granite and marble processing with advanced cutting technology.
products.description: The C-2300 Block Cutter is engineered for precision cutting of granite and marble blocks. Features advanced hydraulic systems, diamond wire cutting technology, and automated controls for consistent results.

products.name: LPM Disk Polishing Machine
products.shortDescription: Advanced disk polishing machine for achieving mirror finish on granite and marble surfaces.
products.description: The LPM Disk Polishing Machine delivers exceptional surface finishing with rotating disk technology. Perfect for achieving mirror-like finishes on various stone surfaces.

products.name: LPM Flicker Machine
products.shortDescription: Specialized flicker polishing machine for textured surface finishing on stone materials.
products.description: The LPM Flicker Machine creates unique textured finishes on stone surfaces. Ideal for decorative applications and specialized surface treatments.

products.name: Stone Processing Machine
products.shortDescription: Multi-purpose stone processing machine for various cutting and shaping operations.
products.description: Versatile stone processing equipment designed for multiple operations including cutting, shaping, and finishing of various stone materials.

products.name: WSM Wire Saw Machine
products.shortDescription: Precision wire saw machine for cutting large stone blocks with diamond wire technology.
products.description: The WSM Wire Saw Machine utilizes diamond wire cutting technology for precise cutting of large stone blocks. Features automated controls and high cutting efficiency.
